name: Tomb Raider (VI): The Angel of Darkness

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider - The Angel of Darkness/Launcher.exe

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider - The Angel of Darkness/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /sp- /verysilent /norestart /suppressmsgboxes /nogui
    executable: $installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
